duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and drive high priority network initiatives and projects in both cloud and hybrid cloud models.
Evaluate network infrastructure and connectivity solutions and make recommendations to migrate applications and data workloads to a cloud-based model.
Collaborate with leadership, enterprise business partners, vendors, and project teams to develop documentation and tools for resolving technical issues related to cloud architecture and design.
Provide technical expertise to project managers and stakeholders about migrating and transitioning applications to cloud-based services and operating and maintaining applications once migrated.
Participate in potential refactoring, rebuild, or redesign required during cloud migration.
Develop and maintain network scripts to allow operations to deploy and configure environments after operational turnover.
Provide feedback to leadership and peers on risks identified during business impact analysis, site risk assessments, and disaster recovery planning.
Maintain technical knowledge and business acumen within the discipline.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or Computer Networking (Master's preferred)
Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA) certification acceptable with other network credentials.
